Topic.Title: Move Player to the same Room an Object is in?

Posts.EditableText:
Is it possible to have a Droppable object that you can link an Exit to?

I.e. If I use a certain Exit, it drops an object from my inventory in whichever room I'm in, then I use another exit that returns me to the Room in which the Object was dropped?

How would I do this?
Posts.HTML:
Is it possible to have a Droppable object that you can link an Exit to?

I.e. If I use a certain Exit, it drops an object from my inventory in whichever room I'm in, then I use another exit that returns me to the Room in which the Object was dropped?

How would I do this?

Posts.EditableText: Hello! Name of object: Obj The script you need is: ``` player.parent = Obj.parent ``` Or use game.pov instead of player; it's good practice: ``` game.pov.parent = Obj.parent ``` If you're using an exit, go to the script attribute of it and write: If Exit name is ext: ``` ext.to = Obj.parent ``` Or ``` this.to = Obj.parent ``` this is a shortcut which uses the name of exit or object you're currently editing.
